data.name: Berry
data.description:
## What Is Berry (BERRY)?

Berry Store is a donation auction platform where celebrities can donate their personal items to be auctioned off, with proceedings being donated to charities.

The Berry Store system allows celebrities to put up items for auction (or use their talents) and gives users rewards for sharing content. The platform’s mission is to create a trustworthy donation paradigm between celebrities, fans and society in general.

Berry launched on February 14, 2020.


### Who Are the Founders of Berry?

Han Hoju is the founder and co-CEO of Berry Culture Inc. Before Berry, he worked as the director of Pico Co. Ltd. and CEO of Saenal Planning Co. Ltd.

Eunji Choi is the head of Berry’s engineering team. He graduated from Inha Technical College based in Seoul, South Korea.


#### What Makes Berry (BERRY) Unique?

Berry Store is an auction system that caters to the needs of both celebrities and fans. The platform has two main functions: it generates income and collects donations. It is built on three types of goods (cherished items, talents and project goods) that are sold in completely different ways (auction, selective sale and general sale, respectively).

For user convenience and donation transparency, the company uses the native BERRY token.

Each month, Berry Store burns 5% of the monthly trading volume to drive up the price of BERRY. The donations on the Berry platform are made in BERRY tokens, which the charities then exchange for cash.

#### How Many Berry (BERRY) Coins Are There in Circulation?

Berry (BERRY) has a maximum supply of 10,000,000,000 tokens, and no circulating supply data is available as of March 2021.

20% of the total BERRY supply is reserved for business expansion, 18% for partner allocation, 12% for overseas business progress, 12% for the private IEO sale, 10% for domestic and international exchanges, 10% for Berry Store platform development, 8% as a reserve on internal exchanges, 5% for marketing and 5% for legal counseling and as incentives for the team and the ecosystem.


### How Is the Berry Network Secured?

Berry is based on Luniverse, an enterprise-scale blockchain-as-a-service product.


### Where Can You Buy Berry (BERRY)?

Berry (BERRY) can be traded on the following exchanges:



*   [ProBit Exchange](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/probit-exchange/)
*   [GOPAX](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/gopax/)
